website_summaries.verdict: The Plantronics BackBeat PRO Bluetooth over-ear headphones sound very good, but the active noise cancellation feature should be used sparingly.
pros: Balanced, full sound signature with noise cancellation disabled
cons: Active noise cancellation significantly hurts sound quality

website_summaries.verdict: The Plantronics BackBeat PRO 2 headphones combine solid noise cancellation with Bluetooth connectivity, excellent sound, and a comfortable fit, all at a very reasonable price.
cons: Noise cancellation isn't quite on par with Bose

customer_reviews.title: Rest in peace my audible friends.
customer_reviews.text: Owned for 2 years and these guys have just given up the ghost. I've decided to write their obiturary on the very page I bought them from to pay my respects in full. I have used and abused these headphones from +40*C to -20*C (I have a strange job) and they have stubbornly performed to their upmost. Despite never having heard of plantronics before I bought them, I am now sold on this brands ability to produce high quality audioware. Yes my headphones are dead but holy cr*p, the way I treated them they should have lasted me 4 months at best. RIP my beautiful Backbeat pros, you sing for the angels now.
customer_reviews.author: J M.

customer_reviews.title: Robust, high quality
customer_reviews.text: After four years of heavy use, still going strong. The only thing is I had to replace the ear soft padding with some generic pads found on the internet and that significantly reduced the noise cancellation, but as they were, they were magnificent. The sound is brilliant, the bass is awesome and the treble crisp, if only slightly less balanced and round than for example Beats Pro. Add into the mix that I bought these for some 89 quid as a flash sale and I realise this must've been one of my best purchases.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Tudor OPREA

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones. Audio quality is really good BUT noise ...
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones. Audio quality is really good BUT noise cancelling could be better. Also, if you want to use the feature of having 2 devices connected at the same time, make sure both of them are really close to you. When, for instance, you are listening to something on your iPad on your bedroom and your iPhone is on your living room, the song will intermittently "fail" (stop for a second). Not a big deal but annoyed me until I realise when the "failing" was coming from so I just keep both devices close to me or disconnect the one Im not listening to.
customer_reviews.author: humberto

customer_reviews.title: A Must Buy!! :D
customer_reviews.text: This baby is the best I have tried. Pros: Very comfortable. Long battery life. I have ran it continuously for 13 before charge warning. Gives a verbal update of battery levels every time you turn it on and put on the headset Pauses video and music when you take of headset. (Can be turned off with the Headset Updater) Gets updates. Very clear sound. Bluetooth Calls are a breeze and a must with this. Cons It tooks soooo beautiful that I'm scared it will be stolen Will be testing out the Noise cancellation soon. Both on train and flight. Will update review then :)
customer_reviews.author: Mr Sheeplette

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper and better!
customer_reviews.text: I tried the AKG bluetooth headphones, but they were too loose and let in too much noise. I then tried the Bose bluetooth, but, although the sound was amazing, they too let in too much noise. These are cheaper than both, but have far more features. They also block out a lot of sound, even without noise cancelling on. I was afraid they would be heavy, but they are actually quite comfortable. I was umming and ahhhing between these and the Beats, but these won on price and the fact that you can use them with a cord if the power runs out. You can't do this with the Beats. Happy!!
customer_reviews.author: Smokey Bacon Jr

customer_reviews.title: Plantronics bluetooth headphones well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: There have been comments that these headphones were a bit heavy on the bass, to a degree I agree but you can reduce this if your phone or computer has a built in graphic equaliser. Other than that they are well built, well packaged and so far the battery life is excellent. some may find them heavy on the head. They are easy to use and download the Plantronics software to receive software updates and change the settings to suit your needs. Overall the best Bluetooth headphones I have had for quite some time, not reference headphones but what do you expect for just over a hundred quid.
customer_reviews.author: col

customer_reviews.title: good headphones. pairs easy
customer_reviews.text: good headphones .pairs easy , connects 2 sources at once , noise cancelling , microphone , battery lasts for ages . If you've never heard of Plantronics then you might have heard the phrase "one small step for man , one giant leap for mankind " - that was broadcast from a Plantronics headset .
customer_reviews.author: S M.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality sound!
customer_reviews.text: I have a pair of these already and bought these as a back up as I liked the sound it produces. My purchase was of a second hand item and for the price it is a quality item and for me was better than buying an unknown Chinese brand. Naturally has a very bassy sound which suits my listening requirements down to a T!! Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Darkalien

customer_reviews.title: Ear pad problem
customer_reviews.text: Sound is good. Battery life is good. Controls are good and easy to learn. Noise cancelling fairly effective. Comfort is OK. Power lead is short and only on the left (not good for me). However,after about six months the left ear pad came apart, not good as I only use these at home maybe 2 or 3 times a week. I glued it but it was never going to last and the right is now also going. Meanwhile, the cheaper brand that I bought for my daughter are fine. Ebay does replacement ear pads but at some point I suspect I'll go back to Sennheiser kit.
customer_reviews.author: Leptospirillum

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, shame about the niggles
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality has been excellent and the headphones are great value for money at their price now compared to their competitors, unfortunately the Bluetooth reliability and hands free microphone let them down. I regularly find I have to reboot them because the Bluetooth connection cuts out with crackling sounds when the device in only a meter or so away and regularly get complaints that I can't be heard when using them as a hands free kit for my phone. If you don't need the hands free function and are able to put up with restarting them every now and then they are great value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Dendanier

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommended. before I bought it I have been comparing ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in April 2015. I have used it during traveling by train and flights numerous times. R&B music sounds so alive (when ANC is on the deep bass sounds better) and so does heavy metal music (may need to adjust the equaliser). Definitely recommended. before I bought it I have been comparing BOSE, BEATS, Sony etc but this plantronics is definitely the best of all. definitely recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Otto

customer_reviews.title: A High Quality Headset
customer_reviews.text: Firstly I should say that even at the reduced price of just under £98 this was a substantial purchase for me. But with these you really do get what you pay for, they simply ooze quality from the box to the build and sound. I used these to listen to a film I had previously watched and the difference in audio quality through these was incredible. The sound separation, distinction and levels are all excellent. These headphones are well made and well designed I particularly like the rotary volume control mounted where it should be, on the earpiece no more fumbling around for rocker switches hidden under the earpiece. Without doubt the best headphones I have ever tried.
customer_reviews.author: Brummie

customer_reviews.title: Ecellent headphones, especially for the price compared to other top makes.
customer_reviews.text: Thinking these migh be better than my Parrot Zik II 'phones, for sound quality that is, the ambient noise-reduction is not quite as good. By default a bit too bassy for my tastes, but easily adjusted on the play-back device. Astoundingly long battery life (particularly compared to the Parrot Ziks), very comfortable & not noticably heavy (as some have siad). Overall very happy with these, only one complaint is I can't figure out how to turn off the lady's voice announcements (like 'Pairing, 'Volume Maximum' etc) which are a little intrusive, but I've got used to it.
customer_reviews.author: exo

customer_reviews.title: ... used to using these and I have always used good quality earphones
customer_reviews.text: It took me a while to get used to using these and I have always used good quality earphones. They can become slightly uncomfortable if wearing for a long time and as they are leather you may sweat. Despite this, the sound quality, base, battery life, noise cancelling and build quality are all excellent. I like the feature that when you remove the headphones it stops the music, it's good for when you forget you had them turned on and pop into another room.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: You'll Not Regret It.
customer_reviews.text: I love these. I have Bose, Sennheiser & B&W and these compete. I do a lot of UC (a lot!) working from home and a very noisy office - these headphones have changed my whole office experience. I'm un-corded, Skype for Business-ed connected (combined with a Plantronics BT300-M) and musically de-stressed as these function as multipoint receivers. My iPhone is simultaneously connected and the darn things even remote control the iPhone!! I bought two and then bought some for my kids. Plantronics it you read this time for a class 1 BT300-M replacement and a 3.5mm class 1 BT4.0 multipoint transmitter so I can hook up the TV.
customer_reviews.author: Frank B

customer_reviews.title: Boy oh boy these cans are good.
customer_reviews.text: Everything about them is class. Robust yet elegant in design and so easy to operate. I love the two large circular dials on each can to control volume and skip/ff a track. Battery is excellent lasting that many hours I forget when they were last charged. I have large ears and wear glasses and where other cans would make the ears hurt after a short spell these give no issues whatsoever. I waited and waited for these to come down in price...... I should have just bought them on day one.
customer_reviews.author: MikeAP

customer_reviews.title: Good at the price.
customer_reviews.text: Good sound and fairly comfortable with an impressive charge life. However a little heavy (trade-off for charge life) and the noise reduction (which could be better but then again, we are not paying BOSE prices here) only works well when the headphones are actually active (e.g. playing music). Pretty decent overall, but if you want top end noise cancellation I suspect you need to cough for a set of BOSE. I will next time but I am not unhappy with these for the price.
customer_reviews.author: LordOfRuin

customer_reviews.title: Truly Fantastic sound! Great styling and comfort.
customer_reviews.text: Stunning! Can handle any type of genre, full rich sound maybe a touch bass heavy but I like that. Fit well and the noise cancelling is great at taking out the 'shell to the ear' sensation you get without it. Giving an immersive experience. Battery life is great and the intuitive controls on the outside of both ear pieces makes them a joy to use. Very keenly priced for such a high level of sound quality and styling. Why pay more they are fantastic. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Gingermac46

customer_reviews.title: Great set of headphones
customer_reviews.text: Great set of headphones, wanted something cheaper than Bose as get through these at a rate of knots. I also wanted them to survive a weeks commute without the need for recharge. After a full week of est 18hr use they are still half charged so job done. Sound quality is very good, build quality excellent. No Bluetooth drop outs. Controls intuitive and easy to operate. Delivered quickly. Will give them time to settle in before conclude on sound quality fully but initially top notch. I think they compete strongly on every level with Bose which I did try out, so for less than half the price I am happy.
customer_reviews.author: J. Clements

customer_reviews.title: They have a good sound although a little bulky but easy to use ...
customer_reviews.text: Headphones appeared on time after some chasing of the Courier. Would have no problems in recommending ligo electronics to friends. They have a good sound although a little bulky but easy to use controls. I purchased them purely for use with my upstairs PC so that I could use them, via a class 1 adapter, around the house (and garden) for their long transmitting range. I live in a three bed-terrace and the range was fine around the house however not for any outside use!
customer_reviews.author: Halina

customer_reviews.title: These are amazing. Massively heavy out the box
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing. Massively heavy out the box, but comfortable once on top of your head - but the sound... Oh man. They leave everything I've owned for dust. I've been listening to Shostakovich and Man Friday - Larry Levine. The detail and clarity, fat rolling bass is fantastic. I wear these in the house now rather than listen on my Sonos. No offence Sonos - but...
customer_reviews.author: LuminferousEther

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding for sound quality and comfort with great Noise reduction
customer_reviews.text: This was worth every penny of the price. The fit is perfect for long sessions even for an old fogey like me! The sound quality is excellent; and the volume more than adequate. I like all sorts of music [if it is worth listening to!] this headset covers them all. Especially however, I have found my classical collection on my iPod coming through witha new brilliance and tone; and for that alone I would have paid twice the price. Thankyou Plantronics for a great piece of audio kit and thank you Amazon for making it available!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. K. H. Plunkett

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Bought these backbeat pro Plantronics from Amazon warehouse as reconditioned, they were described as no original box which i don’t see being an issue as it would end up in the bin on arrival anyway.. however the headphones themselves appear to be brand new supplied in a replacement box with all brand new cables and carry bag. I am so glad I went for these as they are an absolute bargain at £70! The quality of this product is high and probably a good buy at anything up to £150.
customer_reviews.author: TomTom

customer_reviews.title: Loving it
customer_reviews.text: Awesome headset. Amazing battery life. Little on the heavy side but completely survivable. I personally enjoy the sound they produce, but that goes different from person to person. --UPDATE-- I had an issues with damage over the leather..ish cover for the soft material that cover the ears over the headphones. That cover tore on the glued/stitched part of it. Their customer support was fast to respond and very adequate. Got my replacement in two weeks. In general I'm very happy with the brand. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These headphones are brilliant. The sound
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are brilliant. The sound, the functions on the earpieces are all great. They get used at work and home. Would highly recommend them. I usually buy sennheiser but bought these after a demo.
customer_reviews.author: Antony Allen

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Fantasic sound,comfortable to wear.Amazing that you dont have to connect with cables.Some people have said therye heavy,uncomfortable,i didnt find them so.They are rearly a quality product,nice bag and cables if you need them.They turn off when you hang them round your neck. I havent tried the noise cancelling yet.Fantastic pair of headphones.Also extreemly quick delivery.Marks 11 out of 10
customer_reviews.author: gray

customer_reviews.title: Can't fault them
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality headphones - easy to set up, charges quickly, last a LONG time (3 weeks after getting them have only charged them once), pairs easily. Great sound quality although I struggle to hear much of a difference between turning external noise on and off. The range is excellent as well - have been upstairs with phone downstairs, in the back garden with phone inside the house and there has been no loss of sound. If you're looking for a high quality pair of wireless headphones, look no further.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Howard Walker

customer_reviews.title: Truly exceptional wireless headphones
customer_reviews.text: Perhaps my best ever online purchase. More than very pleased with them; so much so that I bought my wife a pair as well. She wanted them for her regular shorthaul flights and says they removed the jet engine noise when the noise cancelling function was on. Perfect controls setup; even with gloved hands. And really detailed,full sound for half the price of AKG's.
customer_reviews.author: Geebee

customer_reviews.title: Best wireless headphones with ANC
customer_reviews.text: I have spent a lot of time to compare and test almost all of headphones available between £100 and £300 to find the best headphones to bring my music on the go. I wanted a wireless pair of headphones with ANC, but without sacrifice a good sound, strong bass, full midrange and hights crisp. Only comparable with Parrot Zik, the winner is Plantronics Backbeat Pro for build quality and battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Damien

customer_reviews.title: Had for a year and still amazing
customer_reviews.text: I've had these for a year and they are fantastic, I recently bought some Bluedio UFO 8 driver headphones for my partner that were supposed to be 'amazing' and have incredible 3D audio...they were nothing in comparison to my Plantronics so I'm replacing them with another pair of these. Battery is excellent too I've only charged them a handful of times. Love them! No problems whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Jus

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy
customer_reviews.text: These are a great pair of cans. The only (very slight) negative is that they are a little on the heavy side. That said, I can live with the weight because of the great sound reproduction, very good noise cancellation and fantastic battery life. I use them daily for up to two hours at a time and they only need charging once per week! The controls are easy to master and they really are a quality item. Buy without concern or hesitation if you are in the market for a pair of wireless cans.
customer_reviews.author: CHRISTOPHER G MARTIN

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, good battery life but very poor pad quality.
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, battery life and comfort but the durability is pretty awful. After two years of very casual use (maybe once every two weeks on average) the left ear pad has split. Seen the other reviews here this seems to be a very common occurrence with these Platronics. Other reviewers have had the same happen to them just after two years of use. Disappointed that Platronics does not address the issue at all or provide replacements. Will definitely stay away from the brand for the next ones.
customer_reviews.author: Nito

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great headhpones. I use with 2 phones (an apple and an android) and they work perfectly. I have used them for listening to music, podcasts and making phone calls Noise cancelling is not at bose standards, but works reasonably well for me (its made the London underground way more bearable, no longer having to listen at full volume) Battery life is excellent. The on headphone controls are great and I like how they automatically pause playback when you take them off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good but not the best for classical music listeners
customer_reviews.text: I agree with the large number of fans of this product. However I listen mostly to classical music and my wife happened to have delivered at the same time a pair of Beats Solo2. Using a bluetooth transmitter, as my hi-fi is not enabled, I was able to compare the two. The Beats won by their greater detail and presence. Maybe the price difference has something to do with it too but a user with a different music preference may well get a different result. As an aside, to achieve the comparison I had to disable the sensors on the Plantronics or they dropped the connection to the transmitter when removed.
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: Best Budget Bluetooth Headphones available...
customer_reviews.text: Superb quality, love the dual bluetooth connections. So glad to have left wired headphones at last. Works a treat with my Apple TV4 as well so it's great for late night/early morning viewing or just walking around the house with music. Battery life is terrific and reports in to my iPhone on remaining percentage. ANC isn't bad but is only really useful for planes. I flew recently and it made the flight ultimately more bearable. Only negative is the weight of the headphones after sustained usage. Not an issue for me.
customer_reviews.author: jPc

customer_reviews.title: Noise cancelling vibration
customer_reviews.text: I really liked these headphones, they felt great on and the sound quality is very good and they have great features such as stop start when taking them off. A downside is they are heavy. However I had two sets and they both suffered from the same fault which is vibration when noise cancelling is activated. The vibration is so bad that the headphones are totally unusable. I strongly recommend that anyone buying these headphones conducts extensive testing of the noise cancelling feature before the allowed return date. Maybe I was unlucky but two faulty sets say I wasn't!
customer_reviews.author: David UK

customer_reviews.title: Absolutley fantastic pair of headphones
customer_reviews.text: Absolutley fantastic pair of headphones. Built well, easy to pair up to two media devices. Sound quality is amazing. Fit nice and comfortable over my ears. Noise cancelling is not as good as Bose but then I personally don't have a problem with this as the price is worth paying for these quite decent set of Bluetooth headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Scott H.

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones, could be better quality
customer_reviews.text: Had the headphones for just over a year, loved them! Great battery life, if not better than advertised. Loved the sound quality and the noise cancelling. But after this summer, the ear cushions started to peel open which is a huge shame. The headphones still work, only fear they won't be as comfortable any more and the warrenty just expired too so can't get them replaced either.
customer_reviews.author: CJ Guilbert

customer_reviews.title: Quality Kit
customer_reviews.text: These Bluetooth headphones are a must have for any audiophile. The sound is incredible and the controls on the sides are very useful when listening to a playlist. The battery is great and I can wear them for long periods of time without my ears becoming sore. The noise cancellation works really well when listening to music. I've had these headphones for about a week now and have experienced no issues I love this product and highly recommend them to anyone looking for great sounding Bluetooth headphones
customer_reviews.author: L C Fea

customer_reviews.title: No Skype PC / Smartphone Tel calls mic functionality
customer_reviews.text: They're really good, but beware of the dual connectivity promises and using the headphones with say; both Skype on a Laptop and your Smartphone for taking calls. It won't work. I've solved the issue which is related to the mic it seems. If you use a separate mic with your laptop everything will work fine. But if you try to use the Backbeat Pro for your laptop mic and smartphone mic, connected at the same time, it will not work. Not sure if this is a compatibility issue with Skype, as I haven't done enough testing. But my view coincides with most forums on the issue. Still best headphones I've owned with this one major issue.
customer_reviews.author: sunny12345

customer_reviews.title: Very good product for a bargain!!
customer_reviews.text: Very good product. Nice sturdy frame. The bass is very warm and the highs and mid tones are quite well placed. The bluetooth works great even from a long distance. Good active noise cancellation. The product weight may feel a bit heavy for some users. But I think this a matter of personal choice and taste. Overall I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: arijitsharma

customer_reviews.title: Excellent features - I only wish they had been more comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality and ANC was very good. Feature-set was also excellent - I particularly licked the voice prompts! The only downside was comfort. The heeadset is pretty heavy, and I could wear them for about 45 minutes before they were just too uncomfortable (read: painful!) to wear with an ache around both ears, and pain across the top of my head. A great pity indeed, but long duration comfort is a prime factor. Had to return to Amazon for a refund (and Amazon maintained their great customer service).
customer_reviews.author: Bruisah

customer_reviews.title: A bit underwhelmed.....
customer_reviews.text: Based on the reviews I'd read I was expecting to be blown away by these phones. However I can't help feeling a little disappointed. The sound is ok but not that brilliant. The wireless facility is good and the controls on the headset are very handy. The noise cancelling is not very good. Switch on the ANC (Active Noise Cancelling) and you will barely notice any difference.
customer_reviews.author: Sibylle B.

customer_reviews.title: Lovely product !
customer_reviews.text: I'm sooo happy with this product ....I will buy again and again...Super quality sounds and BASS ...new technology.....I'm using this without charging whole week.....so guys just hit BUY ! Thank you PLANTRONICS !
customer_reviews.author: Orak

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: The amount of features the bluetooth enabled headphones have is brilliant alone. The smart sensors work very well, all the buttons/sliders feel satisfying when used and the overall build quality is very high. It is a pleasure to have whilst listening to music which requires decent levels of bass and speech quality when listening to books online. Good build quality Great features Very Comfy Easy setup - Win 8.1, Andriod and win 7 (in my experience) Nice bag to keep it away from dust. Kept my hand in it for way too long :) 11/10 Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: waseem

customer_reviews.title: These are excellent. I bought these for my VERY sick father ...
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent. I bought these for my VERY sick father who neaded to escape reality . blue tooth pair easily and give great sound
customer_reviews.author: Bower Brands

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these after trying a cheaper model which broke after a few weeks. These feel excellent quality and the sound output is very good. We purchased these primarily for plane journeys and for the noise cancelling feature and in this respect we were not disappointed. An added bonus is the bluetooth feature which works really well with my iPhone and the controls on the headphones themselves provide added functionality. Well worth the money paid, although should be noted that these were purchased for circa £130 rather than the original list price of double this figure.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Meadows

customer_reviews.title: The bass response is excellent though as my higher frequencies sensitivity has been going ...
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. Had to pull sides apart to make it looser on the ears Battery just goes on and on. No probs pairing yet. As well as pairing it to an Adroid table, I have also paired it with the JUSTOP BTT005 Bluetooth Wireless Stereo Audio Transmitter, though when I remove the headphones from my head, it loses the pairing to the BTT005 - will contact Plantonics about this. The bass response is excellent though as my higher frequencies sensitivity has been going down through the years, I could do with tone controls to decrease the bass and increase the treble somewhat.
customer_reviews.author: ade2012

customer_reviews.title: Great sounding Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Great sounding Headphones, ANC works well when on public transport to reduce low end noise. No probs with connectivity, great battery life and can use with cable if you run out of juice on the go.. nice nifty features like automatic pause and resume when take off and put back on headphones and also using the external mics to pick up external sound without having to take headphones off. Delivered on time with estimated date. Great product and service.
customer_reviews.author: Ddoc

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I owned three quite good headphones and this is the best so far. They deliver what is expected from all the positive reviews. Pros: - Good audio sound. I'm just a happy amateur but the quality sound very good. - Good voice call. This is the only headphone my friends haven't complained about the voice quality. - Battery is very good. I only use the noice cancelling function when it's required so the battery last even longer then. Cons: - A little larger than my previous headphones. It still doesn't bother me but might be to big for some people.
customer_reviews.author: Anders E.

customer_reviews.title: Heavy and bulky
customer_reviews.text: These are vey clever headphones but it is important t realise that they are very heavy and bulky and you might be just as well off with a lightweight pair of headphones and a thin cable. The headband is quite tight and not that adjustable considering the weight. I will keep them but I wish I had tried them out first.
customer_reviews.author: soundophiliac

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase, have been recommending - heavy and large though
customer_reviews.text: Highlights: Great base notes, noise cancelling gets rid of annoying background stuff. Doesn't work so well if you don't have music playing also. Easy to answer/deny phone calls. Bluetooth is really handy. Struggling to find something bad to say about these tin cans. Ah yes - the size. I don't care if I look ridonkulous, but after about an hour of constantly wearing them in work, they do start to hurt where they drag your head down with their weight. Definitely on the heavy side. Apart from that, I think the price matches the quality. Good mid range headphones for those who crave a pair of Bose.... but really don't want to part with that amount of money.
customer_reviews.author: Miss B.

customer_reviews.title: awesome sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Best-in-class range, awesome sound quality, pillowy pads, great features. Too big and not portable! Ended up getting some Sony MDR-ZX770, which have worse range, similar features, less boomy bass, but I can kind of put in a backpack without it taking up the whole thing. Plantronics, make something over-ear like this, but smaller and folding, and I'll love you forever.
customer_reviews.author: lo echaron del bar

customer_reviews.title: Best headphones I've ever had!
customer_reviews.text: The best headphones I've ever had by a mile! Perfectly crisp sound all round, while wireless or wired. Great range without distortion. Almost got 4 stars because I find them uncomfortable some times when I have them on for long periods. But that's down to my big ears. You will not be disappointed with these!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sound. Brilliant customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality The noise cancelling works well and there is no sound "leakage" to the outside. If you are linking to a PC or laptop you may need to run windows update to get them to function correctly. The customer support was second to none!
customer_reviews.author: Chas

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing!
customer_reviews.text: Initially I found these headphones pretty good, however they have got slightly tinny over the two months that I have had them. When you buy expensive headphones you expect them to be pretty flawless and all of the top of the range headphones to be of the same quality to the average ear, however these are definitely sub standard after a few months. Disappointed big time! If I was buying again I would choose a different brand / pair
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fabric falling off and humming noise when NC is on.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these as a gift. After about a year the fabric inside the ear part started coming off. Also, they have a small humming sound when the noise canceling is turned on.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Andersen

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: Wow, wow and wow. I have a pair of Beats Studio 2's. These blow them out the water on every level. Superb audiophile quality at incredible price. They are 5 stars in most audio reviews at the original RRP of £250 let alone this price. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: sbh295

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and build quality.
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones. Received promptly as referbished and in excellent condition. All accessories present and in good condition, including the bag. Nice sounding headphones with decent noise cancelling. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Padfield

customer_reviews.title: just get them
customer_reviews.text: was not sure at first as I have 3 pair of expesive ones which are all great and yo be honest did not expect these to match them ,but I am very happy they do and are the best blu tooth ones I have ever heard sound ease of use battery and comfort all 5 stars very happy chappy thanks
customer_reviews.author: trevor wolstenholme

customer_reviews.title: but you can't use the microphone without the sound going incredibly bad, almost telephone quality
customer_reviews.text: The noise cancellation is okay, but you can't use the microphone without the sound going incredibly bad, almost telephone quality. Thats the big downside. I would have expected for this price to have had decent hi-fi sound when using the mic too.
customer_reviews.author: A. Dixon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, a must buy.
customer_reviews.text: The best headphones I have worth the money, you will need to break the speakers in to get the best but once broken in they're the perfect headphones. And I can't fault the features! I will get a next pair if these ever break or stop working. The black and purple combination is perfect with velvet lined looking bag that it has, screams premium. Better then those beats headphones. 10/10
customer_reviews.author: ceaz

customer_reviews.title: ... - they're big (but not too heavy) and it's easy to feel a bit self-conscious walking around with them ...
customer_reviews.text: Downside - they're big (but not too heavy) and it's easy to feel a bit self-conscious walking around with them (but they're OK sitting in plane or train) Upside - great sound, great noise-cancelling, great functionality (especially phone call integration), easy to use, well built, comfortable, great bluetooth range and I like the "microphone" function. I bought a pair and I've now bought my Son a pair. Unless you need especially small size or need them for running or exercise, buy them now!
customer_reviews.author: A M Graham

customer_reviews.title: Great sound from these phones-they do tend to get a ...
customer_reviews.text: Great sound from these phones-they do tend to get a little sweaty if you are moving around when wearing them but they are well worth looking at if you are in the market for a quality set of headphones-battery life is good too-i would recommend these to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: GRAHAM

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and does what expected of it
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and does what expected of it. It is a large item, so don't expect to go unnoticed but it's not meant for that. Bluetooth connection is good although I had some breaking up of the connection when having it connected to my BB phone, although just as an experiment in the middle of large crowd with interferences. Strongest points would be the battery life, comfort and sound. Really cool feature with the microphone to hear surrounding noise without having to remove the headphones and the automatic stopping when removing the headphones. All in all as advertised and pleased with it, also given the competitors' prices
customer_reviews.author: Luca Moranzoni

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones!!
customer_reviews.text: These headphones have so many great features, great sound for a fantastic price. Only downside is they are extremely heavy and for prolonged periods of use it may lead to some neck pain or discomfort. These are my favourite sounding Bluetooth headset.
customer_reviews.author: Pyrosdestiny

customer_reviews.title: Nothing not to like.
customer_reviews.text: Good headset. Great sound. Use it on the central line and the noise cancelling does a good job of reducing the engine noise. Lots of features but feature I like is the one where a button press mutes whatever you're listening to and amplifies what's' going on around nd you. Which means you can have a conversation without having to remove the headphones. Which means I don't really use the others feature whereby taking my the phones of your ears automatically pauses whatever you're listening too. My favourite headphone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High quality headphones with a ong lifespan
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Almost 3 years old and they are still going strong. I use them daily and the battery life is still sufficient to only need charging every day or two. The sound quality is great and the noise cancelling is sufficient to remove background noise e.g. traffic noise.
customer_reviews.author: Conor Meehan

customer_reviews.title: Heavy but reliable
customer_reviews.text: This is a heavy product but the battery lasts long. I use this for work calls and the quality and reliability are great. This connects to two phones at a time. Added stereo cable option is handy for airplane use
customer_reviews.author: Kalidas

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Having used for over a year, great sound, deep bass. Amazing battery life (easily lasts 2 weeks), noise cancelling does the job (not as impressive as Bose but not far from it). Only issue I have is that the fabric is starting to tear.
customer_reviews.author: Y

customer_reviews.title: Truly awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing headphones. Superb sound and bass. ANC is truly awesome!! I travel for almost an hour everyday on fast virgin train and underground. No compromise on sound quality and can listen to music clearly at low volume. Able to make business phone calls in train with great clarity. Only downside I feel is, its a bit bulky but then its ok.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am still using the headphone. Top quality sound ...
customer_reviews.text: I am still using the headphone. Top quality sound with built in microphone. However, the microphone is a bit behind the ears and sometimes your friend may not hear well if you are doing Skyping or using FaceTime.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can't recommend these more highly
customer_reviews.text: Can't recommend these more highly. Hadn't heard of them before but thought I'd try them. Would rate the quality of these more than some top end headphones. Well worth every penny and one of my best buys
customer_reviews.author: GARY

customer_reviews.title: Best bluetooth headphones in that price category
customer_reviews.text: Functionalities and battery life are great! Sound is very good for that price bluetooth headphones. The biggest cons are that the cans are quite thick(as seen on the photos) and quite heavy. Overall I recommend these, as it seems that they are the best bluetooth headphones in that price category. The only people who I don't recommend it to are the ones that are more after slim style and don't care about sound and battery life that much.
customer_reviews.author: Roland T.

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of headphones
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of headphones, great sound quality, great for phone calls. and fantastic noise cancellation. I also love the fact that you can set volume or change track with the rotating wheels on each side.
customer_reviews.author: J. echavarria

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, sound is excellent, ANC, battery, and range as well. There are two small things I would fix. The rings on left and right earcup (volume and next/previous) are somewhat wobbly. Not a lot, but it takes away from the premium feel of the headphones. Also, the OpenMic feature could sound better. Otherwise, it is an excellent headset for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: jaxxx

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones, great battery life
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in April 2016 and have used them pretty much every day since. Sound quality is amazing, and the battery seems to last forever. Only frustration is the vinyl is now ripped on the headphone itself, but perhaps I have been a bit rough with them. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MR ADAM D PEERS

customer_reviews.title: Really worth it....
customer_reviews.text: Really good value for money compared to the big brands out there such as Bose, etc....
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Hiss Over Bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: They Hiss. They're very comfortable and have a great feature set, good battery life and effective noise cancelation but they have a loud hiss when using bluetooth, particularly noticeable when connected via bluetooth but not actually playing anything.
customer_reviews.author: GShut

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Got these pair instead of the Sony h.ear Bluetooth . Tried them out for 2 days now. Sound isolation s not 100%. Bass is not like my bluedio headsets . Will try out in the gym next .
customer_reviews.author: obi

customer_reviews.title: Best headphones by far
customer_reviews.text: Best headphones by far, It has a sensor that pauses the music when you take off the headphones(i.e rest them around your neck) and it also has a button which allows me to hear my surrounding really well so i don't have to take off the headphones to speak to someone. Great headphones! better than any leading headphone brand.
customer_reviews.author: Joshane Sagoo

customer_reviews.title: Plantronics Backbeat Pro
customer_reviews.text: Great item with a nice fit over ears battery life is amazing and the sound is not muffled good feel and sound is very natural hopefully the ear pads will last along with the battery life so far so good and very happy with purchase the Bluetooth distance is also fantastic for how far away I can still be connected well happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Georgina Shine

customer_reviews.title: A must buy !!
customer_reviews.text: A very good headphone , built quality is absolutely amazing and the amount of features it has certainly makes it one of the best Bluetooth headphones I have ever tried and one last thing the battery lasts 24 Hours.
customer_reviews.author: Amr

customer_reviews.title: Decent ACN, bit dull to look at, but who cares when they sound so good!
customer_reviews.text: Sound 5* Noise Cancellation 3.5/4* - Not as good as Bose in this area but better than most Looks 3* Features 5* Price 5* Wireless/Battery Life 5* If you're after great sounding bluetooth headphones with decent ACN for a price that isn't as ridiculous as the Sennheiser/Bose rivals, and don't mind a rather dull and slightly big looking headphones on your head then these are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Hethers

customer_reviews.title: Poorly constructed product
customer_reviews.text: I only used these on occassions and they failed after a while, internal wiring caused sound output to fail. I thought i was getting a good product, turns out a £10 pair of headphones would have been better. Even the ear lining fell away. Plantronics dont seem to want to build good long lasting products.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Smith

customer_reviews.title: Big sound. Big headphones.
customer_reviews.text: Very good, with excellent noise cancellation and great sound quality. Long battery life, but also with the option of using a cable. Fantastic product, but THEY ARE MASSIVE. Definitely couldn't use for the commute, so returned.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: However sounds great.
customer_reviews.text: Uncomfortable when worn a long time. Finicky pairing. However sounds great.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Amazing tech but not a great fit if you wear glasses
customer_reviews.text: Noise cancelling and comfy headphones is what I'd describe this one. However if you wear glasses you'll feel immediate discomfort after a certain amount of time, which unfortunately made me to buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Heitor Lessa

customer_reviews.title: Very good audio output!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for use with Windows 7 Professional. Very good audio quality. However, I would love to see Platronics include or produce a bluetooth adapter with or for such a product instead of having to buy a third-party adapter. The latter is the reason for 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent headphones
customer_reviews.text: Great quality product, it is just as described by the seller, fast delivery, one happy customer, thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Ionut-Catalin Pascu

customer_reviews.title: Battery life is great and sound quality is very good
customer_reviews.text: Battery life is great and sound quality is very good. Pairing was very straightforward and they work really well. I usually use them for watching videos or movies so they feel comfortable in extended wearing.
customer_reviews.author: K. J. Southern

customer_reviews.title: Good news and bad news
customer_reviews.text: Good news and bad news. The sets are fantastic and tremendous value - much better than thr Dr Beats I've ended up with. Shame that they only pair with smart phone/ipad technology. I tried to pair with a bluetooth transmitter so that I could play my old vinyl but it won't. Tech service confirmed that threre was no way to pair these. Sound and build quality is top notch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... a present for my 23y son he is very pleased with them Comfortable and excellent sound
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a present for my 23y son he is very pleased with them Comfortable and excellent sound quality
customer_reviews.author: Theresa.M.Hare

customer_reviews.title: No more aircraft hum
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for all my air travel. Comfortable to wear. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda B

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really good noise cancelling headphones, probably the best for this price range.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Roy

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in good condition. He is happy with them and has ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought as gift for my son. Arrived in good condition. He is happy with them and has reported when charged they last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding
customer_reviews.text: Tested with a multitude of devices, works very well. Even switching between two phones for music and calls is seamless with the music auto-pause and volume fade in. Great battery life. Perfect for office environment.
customer_reviews.author: D. Cox

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic sound & loud for my old ears Battery lasts forever Love them
customer_reviews.author: Mr.JP Farrington

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Excellent headphones, decent sound, not too heavy, comfortable & good features. Good value for quality product.
customer_reviews.author: TM

customer_reviews.title: Wonderfully made
customer_reviews.text: Ver clear sound production and very easy to set up with any phone
customer_reviews.author: Oracle1

product_meta.title: Plantronics Backbeat Pro Wireless Noise Cancelling Headphones with Mic
product_meta.description:
Style Name:Backbeat Pro| Colour Name:Black

CREATE A LONGER PLAYLIST With up to 24 hours of continuousmusic streaming,BackBeat PROoutlasts most playlists and movie queues.Power-savingfeatures include automatically pausing the streaming audio andactive noise cancellingwhen you slip off your headphones, and a DeepSleep hibernation mode. When the battery finally runs low, switch to thecabled connectionto keep listening longer.

IMMERSE YOURSELF IN MUSIC Oursignature audioperformance delivers all the richbass, crisphighsand naturalmidtonesof yourmusicandmedia. Slip on theexceptional comfortand find refuge in a noisy world. Whether working, travelling or just relaxing, switch on theactive noise cancelling(ANC) to block out the noise and turn a modern, open office layout, noisy caf​e or long flight into a private concert.

TAKE YOUR MUSIC WITH YOU Wander up to 100 metres away from your paired phone or tablet thanks to Class 1Bluetooth 4.0 technology, controlling your experience using easy-to-findon-earbuttons and familiar-feeling dials. Listen to a movie on your tablet and quickly answer a call without removing yourheadphonesor reaching for your phone. When it's time to leave, slip these fold-flat headphones into the slim travel sleeve.



BOX CONTAINS
Wireless USB Charger
Phone Jack
Case
Headphones 200590-05
feature_bullets: Up to 24 hours continuous wireless streaming
Automatic music play/pause when headphones are put on/removed
DeepSleep mode puts headphones into hibernation device, when away from device, extending battery life up to 6 months
Up to 100m* range from Class 1 Bluetooth device. Connects To Tablet,Mac (3.5mm),PC (3.5mm),Mobile Phone,Mobile Phone (3.5mm),Tablet (3.5mm)

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
